mapper.insert: insert into recmv_rev(userNum, movieNum, id, movie, image, title, rating, content, createDate) values(#{userNum}, #{movieNum}, #{id}, #{movie}, #{image}, #{title}, #{rating}, #{content}, now())
mapper.select: select num from recmv_user where id = #{id}
select id from recmv_user where num = #{num}
select rating from recmv_rev where num = #{num}
select rating from recmv_movie where title = #{title}
select count(*) from recmv_rev where movie = #{movie}
select count(*) from recmv_rev where userNum = #{userNum}
select num from recmv_rev where userNum = #{userNum} and movieNum = #{movieNum}
mapper.insert: insert into recmv_like(userNum, revNum, createDate) values(#{userNum}, #{revNum}, now())
mapper.select: select num from recmv_like where userNum = #{userNum} and revNum = #{revNum}
